name: slackoscope
description: Take a peek at slack msgs from inside your code. For those with no short term memory

commands.title: Slackoscope: Post Current File to Linear Issue

slackoscope.token.markdownDescription: **Required:** Slack API token. Can be a plain text token or a 1Password reference (e.g., `op://vault/item/field`). See [1Password documentation](https://developer.1password.com/docs/vscode/) for details.

slackoscope.linearToken.markdownDescription: **Optional:** Linear API token for posting code to Linear issues. Can be a plain text token or a 1Password reference (e.g., `op://vault/item/field`). See [1Password documentation](https://developer.1password.com/docs/vscode/) for details.

slackoscope.inline.enabled.markdownDescription: **Enable inline previews** — Show message content next to Slack URLs in your code

slackoscope.inline.showChannelName.markdownDescription: **Show channel names** — Replace channel IDs with readable names (e.g., `C1234ABC` → `#general`)

slackoscope.inline.showUser.markdownDescription: **Show user names** — Display the message author in inline preview

slackoscope.inline.showTime.markdownDescription: **Show timestamp** — Display message timestamp in inline preview

slackoscope.inline.useRelativeTime.markdownDescription: **Use relative time** — Show timestamps as relative (e.g., '5 minutes ago') instead of absolute dates

slackoscope.inline.fontSize.markdownDescription: **Font size** — Font size for inline preview text (10-24 pixels)

slackoscope.inline.fontStyle.markdownDescription: **Font style** — Font style for inline preview text

slackoscope.inline.color.markdownDescription: **Text color** — Color for inline preview text (CSS color value)

slackoscope.hover.showChannel.markdownDescription: **Show channel in hover** — Display channel name in the hover tooltip

slackoscope.hover.showFiles.markdownDescription: **Show files in hover** — Display attached files in the hover tooltip

slackoscope.hover.showFileInfo.markdownDescription: **Show file info** — Display file size and type information for attached files

slackoscope.highlighting.enabled.markdownDescription: **Enable URL highlighting** — Highlight Slack URLs based on message age

slackoscope.highlighting.todayColor.markdownDescription: **Today's color** — Background color for messages from today

slackoscope.highlighting.oldDays.markdownDescription: **Old message threshold** — Number of days before a message is considered old

slackoscope.highlighting.oldColor.markdownDescription: **Old message color** — Background color for old messages

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
